title: Understanding Formulas
text: A formula in a spreadsheet is a mathematical expression that calculates a value. It can include various elements.

title: Components of a Formula
text: Formulas typically consist of cell references, numbers, and arithmetic operators. These components work together to perform calculations.

hintAnswer: cell references, numbers, and arithmetic operators
title: Identifying Formula Components
text: Which of the following is a correct description of what a formula consists of?
choices: cell references, numbers, and arithmetic operators
